content.body: shu: are you aware of any issues debugging workers when - - harmony-structs or the Shared string table flag are enabled? I'm running issues debugging in VS Code and wanted to check if there were any known issues before I file an issue with VS Code.
content.formatted_body: shu: are you aware of any issues debugging workers when - - harmony-structs or the Shared string table flag are enabled? I'm running issues debugging in VS Code and wanted to check if there were any known issues before I file an issue with VS Code.

content.body: I'm not sure if it's Code, the chrome debug protocol, NodeJS, or V8 causing the issue, but the first breakpoint I hit after starting a worker and passing it a shared struct results in the debugger locking up.
content.formatted_body: I'm not sure if it's Code, the chrome debug protocol, NodeJS, or V8 causing the issue, but the first breakpoint I hit after starting a worker and passing it a shared struct results in the debugger locking up.
